text: Hiba Qadir better known as Hiba Bukhari is a Pakistani actress. She is known for her role as Seemal in Thori Si Wafa (2017), for which she won the Hum Award for Best Soap Actress. She has also played roles in Deewangi (2019), Fitoor (2021), Inteha e Ishq (2021), Meray Humnasheen (2022), Tere Ishq Ke Naam (2023), Radd (2024) and Jaan Nisar (2024). ==Personal life== Hiba was born in Karachi to a Sindhi family. She obtained her F.Sc from Jinnah Government College in Nazimabad. Hiba married Arez Ahmed in a private Nikah ceremony held on 7 January 2022. On 30 September 2024, Bukhari and Ahmed announced their pregnancy through social media. On 28 December 2024, the couple announced the birth of their daughter on social media. ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Category:Pakistani Muslims Category:People from Sindh Category:People from Karachi Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Articles containing Urdu-language text
title: Hiba Qadir
